step.name: 结束
立项书面审批申请

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'
'在底稿系统中完成项目承揽及立项阶段底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程'
'附件信息中的文档都必须上传，请检查！'
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_QY_LXSMSHLC_FJ where lcIB_QY_LXSMSHLC_ID=? and fjm is not null ",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]) >= 1;

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
var result = bean.execute("1006",$Login.User.UserID,"1",O_WORKFLOW.XMMC,"lcIB_QY_LXSMSHLC",'','');
var code =result.get('result');
code ==1;

step.name: 业务部门质控专员审批
部门总经理审批

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审批
投资银行总部职能审批
质控部文管形式审核

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(id)),',',';') from tuser where id in (select userid from jgcrm.lbMember where roleid in (select id from jgcrm.lbRole where name like '%法律合规专员%') AND ORGID = 13832) and Status = 1\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-书面立项流程质控部文管已审核'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 质控部专员(主副审)审核
质控部职能审批
质控部总经理审批
投资银行总部总经理审批
法律合规专员审批
项目组回复质控专员
业务部门质控专员审批
部门总经理

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0
